Title: Relates to the siting of the New York state Martin Luther King, Jr. institute for nonviolence at Medgar Evers college
Summary: Relates to the siting of the New York state Martin Luther King, Jr. institute for nonviolence at Medgar Evers college.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the siting of the New York state Martin Luther King, Jr. institute for nonviolence at Medgar Evers college
